text: An Unusual Summer () is a 1957 Soviet drama movie directed by Vladimir Basov.Советский соловейНЕОБЫКНОВЕННОЕ ЛЕТО (1956) It stars Viktor Korshunov, Roza Makagonova, and Vladimir Yemelyanov. == Actors == * Viktor Korshunov as Kirill Izvekov * Roza Makagonova as Anochka * Vladimir Yemelyanov as Ragosyn * Mikhail Nazvanov as Pastukhov * Yury Yakovlev as Dybych * Yevgeny Teterin as Dorogomilov == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Russian drama movies Category:Russian war movies Category:1957 drama movies Category:1957 war movies Category:Movies directed by Vladimir Basov Category:Movies set in the 1910s
title: An Unusual Summer
